content.query:
select
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.name') AS name,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.username') AS username,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.email') AS email,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address') AS address,
    --JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.street') AS street,
     doc
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://datalakestoragenithin.dfs.core.windows.net/restapi/user.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
order by JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.id') desc
